TEXT.S:
u Costa Rigasa i labu nu Congnanmeico, itiza i 10 00 N, 84 00 W. u ahebal nu lala' mapulung sa izaw ku 51,100 km2.u ahebal nu lala'ay sa izaw ku 51,060 km2, u ahebal nu nanumay sa izaw ku 40 km2. hamin nu tademawan sa 4,872,543. kakalukan umah sa 37.10%, kilakilangan umah sa 51.50%, zumaay henay umah sa 11.40%
tapang tusu nu kanatalu tapang tusu nu kanatal sa u San Jose.
sapadateng nu kanatal demiadsapadateng nu kanatal demiad sa 15 bulad 9 demiad.
tabakiay a tapang nu kanatalu tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (congtung) ayza sa ci Luis Guillermo Solís (··), micakat a demiad sa i 2014 a mihca 5 bulad 8 demiad.
u hata nu Costa rigau kulit nu hata nu Costa riga sa, situlu a kulit, u sumilaway u salenagcay atu sumanahay. Costa Riga kapulungan a kanatal(nu kamu nu Si-Ban-Ya: República de Costa Rica), ngangan tu Costa riga, u imi malubicay a dadipasan,nu inutebanan Amiliaka kanatal, nuwamisan belaw u Nicaraguanutimulan u Panamamatatules ku lala', kahenulan a tuse u Sen-he-si, Costa rigau ayzaay i kitakit u saayaway mipaelesan a hitay nu kanatal, imahini nu Costa riganu inutebanan Amiliaka kakitizaan cin-ci u sakapahay nipalahadana kanatal, kapah makakat kuni kauzip na mahini sibalucu' mipuput tu ihekalay nu mauzipay mulangway i kanatal, yadah ku nu lalayan tu pidiputan, masilut tu i bu-pu-semasilut tu 2020 a mihcaan miales tu namalahitay mananeng tu singangan tu i kanatal. (u kamu nu Hulam sa: Costa riga:República de Costa Rica""2020)
laylayiayaw a zitay nu Ke-lung-pu, izaw tu muengen ku In-di-ana tdemaw i tini i Costa rigau Cung-mey-cow-uan-minmakakatay ku nika uzip atu An-ti-se-wen-mini kalikeluhan. (u kamu nu Hulam sa: ) kasumamadan tu 16 a mihcaan, i tiniay a Ya-mea tademaw a tademaw atu A-ce-tay-cea tademaw, mademec nu Spaina tademaw, satu Costa rigamala u Spaina lala' baluhay a Spainsatimulan a kenis,i sebu i tiza i Ka-ta-keCartago). (u kamu nu Hulam sa: 16Cartago) Costa rigamakalaliw tu nipitebung ilawlaw nu Cung-may-cowpaykanatal masumad tu kawaw nu hitay, caay kalecat tu nu belaw nu kanatal, Costa rigau tanektekay masungaay atu binawlan kumikuwanay tu mahiniay, kasumamdan tu 19 a mihcaan tu zikuzan, kinatusa pacena tu uni u kalalepu a kawaw masawacu tu kunipalahat nu binawlan, 1948 a mihcaan kangangayaw nu kanatal Costa rigaa Cung-tungci He-say-bey-ke-lay-si-bey-lay-rl(··) musakamu paliwasak tu hitay, atu i 1949 a mihcaan unian pahulic han, namahini hausa Costa rigamikaput tu nayay a hitay mikaput tunu binawlanay a nizatengan.Costa rigaanumahinihini mahiza tu palekal tu kanatalay, nika malecat tu katalakaw kuni kauzip, izaw amin ku tantuwa' nu lala', saacapapiidangay a kawaw macakat kuni palahat. (u kamu nu Hulam sa: 191948··1949 )
helal nu lala'Costa rigai tini inutebanan Amilikatanayu'ay likecu'ay a kakitizaan, amis balattu cacay bataan a tu(10), tipan balattu walu bataan izaw ku sepat a tu(84), nutimulan micapi tu Ciy-le-pi' a bayu, satipan micapi nuwamisan a waliyu, izaw ku 1,290 malebut miy ku dadipasan nuwalian a tukusCiy-le-pi-hay212 malebut nu miy, satipan a tukus u waliyu1016 malaebut a depah.Costa riganuwamisan atu Nicaraguamatatules ku lala', u lilis nu kanatal a katanayu' 309 malebut miy, nuwalian nutimulan pasayza i nutimulan atu nu Panamaa lala' (u lilis nu kanatal a katanayu' 639 malebut miy). (u kamu nu Hulam sa: 10;8412902121016309639) pulung izaw ku 51,100 km2, namakasalala'ay 50,660 km2, i lilis nu nanum 440 km2, palaleca tu nu Amilikaa Si-wyi-ci-niy-ya-cuwkaadidi', amahiza tu nu Ireland. (u kamu nu Hulam sa: 5110050660440:20012) Costa rigau liwliw nu lala', dadipasan u masaenalay, tepanay nukanatal masalikaku ku buyu' masulaed, uynian a kanatal sakamusa uyni simungaysitungusay tu sikikalisiwana kenis 200 km katanayu' nu bayu, nubayuwan 12 km katanayu' nu bayu,u bali u akutiay atu tatungusay a akuti' izaw henay ku zuma' u baluhay a akuti'ay. (u kamu nu Hulam sa: :20012)
cen-ceCosta rigau saicelangay nu hulic a nilekecaan tu mahiniay u sunida kapulungan a kanatal, mikawaway tuni cenbu u sidimadau cung-tung ku situngusay, u icelang nu cung-tung kapulung nu kanatal, uynian a kanatal tusa ku midabay atu pasu cacay tademaw midapay tu cung-tung 15 ku tademaw masakaputay nu lalabu nu mikawaway, Cung-tung atu 57 a tademaw nu lipuing a giing u nisikiwan, i sepat a mihcaan mala giing. (u kamu nu Hulam sa: 15574)
sakikalisiwanCosta rigau inutebanan Amilikaa kakitizaan a sakikalisiw u macakatay a kanatal, kapah kuni kauzip atu kayadah ku sakikalisiwan, uyni u kikasumat nu sakikalisiwan hawsa, Costa rigai ayaw namiida tu nikalukan uyni dada' ku palahatantu sakikalisiwan uyni u aidangan u dikiay atu sapangaay tu imelangay pulung han patahakal atu pasubana' tu tineng nikawaw tu angangan tu yadahay tu canacananay a sakikalisiwan. (u kamu nu Hulam sa: )
papiidangay a kawawCosta riganu papiidangay a kawaw paymihcaan kunilaculan a kalisiw19.2 a i'ek nu Amei-lika a kalisiw, nu Cung-may a kakitizaan mizizaway a kanatal miidangay a lapng u sakatuuday nu kanatal, 2013 a mihcaan 242 a mang ku nu tuway kanatal a labang, kayadah ku lalayan nu mauzipay mulangaway, palalecat tu kapahay u angangan nupatizang atu kapahay a nipikuwan nu kanatal, uynian a kanatal papiidangay a kawaw u lalayan izaw tu ku nidademec, u kapahay a idangan izaw ku Yi-la-su silamalay a buyu, A-lel-na'silamalay a buyu Po-lay-se silamalay a buyu', Ao-si-siw-na-el a kanayal, nu kanatalay nu buyu'ay mipaydangaykakitizaan miadingtu aadupan, Meng-te-wo-de-yum-wu' a buyu'an pitiputan tu kakitizaan, Spain nu micumuday a tademaw nisubelidan a lalangawan. (u kamu nu Hulam sa: 19.22013242)
tademawCosta rigaa tademawan malalamelay izang a wawa atu tatenga'ay nu Europe a tademaw pakala' tu siwa a bataan izaw ku sepat a pasantu 94%, angangan mabulaway nu Spain a tademaw, uzuma yadah henay kunu Germany a tademaw, Poland a tademaw, Italy a tademaw atu Jewish a tademaw, i Costa rigauyza dada' cayay kakatuud ku Indians (In-ti-an a tademaw ) makay satipan midebungay ku mauzip, ayza u muenengay nu binacadan a tademaw 29,000 a tademaw dada'caay kaedeng tu pilung nu tademaw tu cacay a pasentu. inahini Italy a tademaw a tademaw macunus tu katuud nu tademaw, angangan u sakangelih uyni an u mabulaawy a kaizaw kakanan nu tademaw, a pakala tu a izaw ku sakalukan numalukay a tademaw. (u kamu nu Hulam sa: 94%290001%)
amilisimetay kawaw nu kanatalCosta rigaatu Mey-kuo i kasumamadan malalayattuay tu Amilika atu sakakaput a kanatal, Costa rigai 2007 a mihcaan atu Cung-haw-min-kuo makaketun malacabay, pananiyul atu China malacabay, satu paales hantu ku Cung-ha-min-kuo mingkiwasa caay a pangangan micumud tu kanatal, namahini hawsa masusul, hamin nu mingkiw nu Cung-haw-min-kuo a minkiw a caay pangangan amicumut tu Costa rigaa kanatal atu ci pazena' mihibamh sayadahay a demiad 90.[1] (u kamu nu Hulam sa: 200790)
